title: Rev the Engine
description: Sixteen extended excerpts by some of the hottest novelists in the MC genre as well as some amazing newbies! Almost 100k in word length- containing heart stopping drama, voracious sexy time, and action that will leave you on the edge of your seat, from the following novels:The Diary of Bink Cummings, Volume 1 (MC Chronicles) - Bink Cummings The Assassin (A Rough Riders MC Companion Novel) - Selene Chardou Nobody's Ol Lady - Needa Warrant Fierce (Storm MC Book 2) - Nina Levine Slow Burn (Lost Kinds MC Book 1) - Autumn Jones Lake Combust ( Devil Chaser's MC )- L Wilder Precarious (Jokers' Wrath MC) - Bella Jewel Holding On (Lights of Peril MC) - A.C. Bextor Harmony (The Club Girl Diaries) - Addison Jane Dual Desires (The Dueling Devils MC) - Shyla Colt Random & Rare ( Lock & Key Book 2)- Cat Porter A Dangerous Reality (The Bent Zealots MC) - Layla Wolfe Breaking Dragon (Savage Brothers MC 1) - Jordan Marie Road Of No Return ( Sex and Mayhem Book 1) - K.A Merikan Firetrap (The Scorched Souls Book 1) - C.L. RileyEnjoy this great taster anthology and pick up your next Badass biker reads! Due to Sexual Content and Profanity: Intended for Ages 18+
author: Bella Jewel
